name: The Final Days: Blood Dawn
description: Text/image based survival game. Your choices will save/destroy lives including yours. You are no hero, no elite soldier... you are a survivor... How far will you get, how long will you live?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher. Processor: The one used by Christopher Colombus Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Black/White TV Sound Card: Old 8-track radio
